name: SSF3
title: Site-Specific Factor 3
subtitle: Number of Regional Lymph Nodes with Extracapsular Tumor
notes: **Note:**  Record the information from the pathology report. If no nodes are removed, code 998.  If the pathology report is unavailable, use code 997.
